8451.HK.summary: Sunlight (1977) Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the supply of tissue products and hygiene related products for corporate customers in Singapore. Its products comprise toilet tissues, including jumbo roll tissues and conventional roll tissues; hand towels; napkins; facial tissues; hygiene-related products comprising hygiene wipes, hygiene gloves, and industrial wipes; and jumbo roll tissue, center-pull hand towel roll, folded hand towel, and automated touchless hand towel roll tissue dispensers. The company markets its tissue products under the Sunlight brand name. Sunlight (1977) Holdings Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Singapore.
